mapper.select: select r_no, (select c_no from community where c_no=reply.c_no) as c_no, (select nickname from members where nickname=reply.nickname) as nickname, rcontent, reg_date from reply where c_no=#{c_no} order by reg_date asc
select count(*) from reply where c_no = #{c_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply(r_no, c_no, nickname, rcontent, reg_date) VALUES(seq_reply_no.nextval, #{c_no}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rcontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE reply SET rcontent=#{rcontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where r_no=#{r_no}
